title: Self-Compassion and Well-being Enhancement Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Most learners are practicing nurses who recognize the need for managing job-related stress and self-care.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three responses to daily stress using mindfulness techniques.
Learners strengthen self-compassionate attitudes through experiential practice and develop two strategies applicable to the work environment.
Learners establish and share a self-compassion and well-being enhancement plan through project deliverables to collect peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
